This edition of the GdPicture component is marked as safe for scripting and safe for initializing.
This edition should be used in WEB projects or within development environment which required to use safe for scripting & safe for initializing components.


WARNING: 

- Before using this edition make sure to register it using the regsvr32 command ! 
- If you encounter problems to load it within some development environment like Visual Basic 6, you probably need to copy the objsafe.tlb into the %windows/system32 directory.


If you are still experiencing problems, please check our F.A.Q. : http://www.gdpicture.com/faq.php
